author: perrotta
body:
#### PR description:

Right after having signed [#36884](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36884) for merge, I realized that I did not manage to ask to apply a few simple code cleanings. to recover it, I implement them here all together.

@marco-link @jfernan2 please check if there is anything wrong with them.

#### PR validation:

It builds, no changes expected
title: Cleaning code recently added in DQMOffline/RecoB
